languages.text: {n}Джай переводит взгляд с Эмелины на Хейнрикса и обратно. Открывает рот пару раз, но в итоге ничего так и не говорит — кроме сдавленного:{/n} "Мне жаль, шерин".

{n}Jae looks at Emelina, then at Heinrix, then back at Emelina again. She opens and closes her mouth a few times, but the only thing she manages to say in a stifled voice is:{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай переводит взгляд с Эмелины на Хейнрикса и обратно. Открывает рот пару раз, но в итоге ничего так и не говорит — кроме сдавленного:{/n} "Мне жаль, шерин".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae looks at Emelina, then at Heinrix, then back at Emelina again. She opens and closes her mouth a few times, but the only thing she manages to say in a stifled voice is:{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae looks at Emelina, then at Heinrix, then back at Emelina again. She opens and closes her mouth a few times, but the only thing she manages to say in a stifled voice is:{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae regarde tour à tour Emelina, puis Heinrix, avant de revenir à la première. Elle ouvre et referme rapidement la bouche plusieurs fois, mais les seuls mots qui parviennent à franchir péniblement ses lèvres sont les suivants :{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, shereen. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at Emelina, then at Heinrix, then back at Emelina again. She opens and closes her mouth a few times, but the only thing she manages to say in a stifled voice is:{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae regarde tour à tour Emelina, puis Heinrix, avant de revenir à la première. Elle ouvre et referme rapidement la bouche plusieurs fois, mais les seuls mots qui parviennent à franchir péniblement ses lèvres sont les suivants :{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, shereen. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイはエメリナからハインリックスに目を移し、またエメリナを見る。彼女は何度か口を開けたり閉じたりしたが、押し殺した声で言えたのは次のことだけだった。{/n}「ごめんなさいね、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at Emelina, then at Heinrix, then back at Emelina again. She opens and closes her mouth a few times, but the only thing she manages to say in a stifled voice is:{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイはエメリナからハインリックスに目を移し、またエメリナを見る。彼女は何度か口を開けたり閉じたりしたが、押し殺した声で言えたのは次のことだけだった。{/n}「ごめんなさいね、シャリーン」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊看了看艾米莉娜，又看了看海因里希，之后又看了看艾米莉娜。她张开了嘴，但却什么都没说出来，最后仅仅用压抑的声音低声说道。{/n}“这真让人遗憾，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at Emelina, then at Heinrix, then back at Emelina again. She opens and closes her mouth a few times, but the only thing she manages to say in a stifled voice is:{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊看了看艾米莉娜，又看了看海因里希，之后又看了看艾米莉娜。她张开了嘴，但却什么都没说出来，最后仅仅用压抑的声音低声说道。{/n}“这真让人遗憾，亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae blickt Emelina an, dann Heinrix, dann wieder Emelina. Sie öffnet und schließt mehrfach den Mund, bringt dann jedoch nur in erstickter Stimme heraus:{/n} "Es tut mir leid, Shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at Emelina, then at Heinrix, then back at Emelina again. She opens and closes her mouth a few times, but the only thing she manages to say in a stifled voice is:{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae blickt Emelina an, dann Heinrix, dann wieder Emelina. Sie öffnet und schließt mehrfach den Mund, bringt dann jedoch nur in erstickter Stimme heraus:{/n} "Es tut mir leid, Shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae mira a Emelina, después a Heinrix, y otra vez a Emelina. Abre y cierra la boca varias veces, pero al final solo logra decir:{/n} «Lo siento, shereen».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at Emelina, then at Heinrix, then back at Emelina again. She opens and closes her mouth a few times, but the only thing she manages to say in a stifled voice is:{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae mira a Emelina, después a Heinrix, y otra vez a Emelina. Abre y cierra la boca varias veces, pero al final solo logra decir:{/n} «Lo siento, shereen».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae önce Emelina'ya, ardından Heinrix'e, sonra tekrar Emelina'ya bakıyor. Birkaç kez ağzını açıp kapasa da tıkanık bir sesle sadece tek bir şey söyleyebiliyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm şirinim."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at Emelina, then at Heinrix, then back at Emelina again. She opens and closes her mouth a few times, but the only thing she manages to say in a stifled voice is:{/n} "I'm sorry, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, Emelina'ya, ardından Heinrix'e, ardından tekrar Emelina'ya bakıyor. Birkaç kez ağzını açıp kapıyor ancak tıkanık bir sesle sadece tek bir şey söyleyebiliyor:{/n} "Üzgünüm şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
